page.title: 11CHATTELS TIMBER YARD BEXTON
page.content: CHATTELS IS ONE OF THE MAIN EMPLOYERS IN THE AREA.THE YARD IS SURROUNDED BY PRIVATE HOUSING.THERE HAS BEEN A TIMBER YARD ON THE SITE FOR ABOUT SIXTY YEARS.CHATTELS DEALS ONLY WITH SOFT WOOD,WHICH COMES MAINLY FROM SCANDINAVIA. POORER QUALITY WOOD,CALLED CARCASSING TIMBER, IS IMPORTED FROM CANADA. ON ARRIVAL ALL THE WOOD GOES THROUGH A TREATMENT PLANT.ALLTHE MOISTURE AND SURFACE AIR IS TAKEN OUT AND PRESERVATIVE IS PUT IN. FROM HERE THE WOOD GOES TO THE MACHINE WORKSHOP,WHERE IT IS SMOOTHED DOWN AND CUT INTO VARIOUS SHAPES AND SIZES. CHATTELS EMPLOYS ABOUT FIFTY PEOPLE;MACHINISTS,DRIVERS,APPRENTICES, ETC. THEY OPENED A D.I.Y. DEPARTMENT IN 1970,TO SERVE THE HOUSING ESTATE.
